no.ntnu.stud.ubilearn.db

Class HandbookDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.ntnu.stud.ubilearn.db.DAO
      • no.ntnu.stud.ubilearn.db.HandbookDAO

  • public class HandbookDAO
extends DAO
    This class acts as a interface between the database and the handbook fragment, by using handbook related models.

        public Article getArticle(java.lang.String id)
        selects the article from the database with the corresponding id
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the article to be returned
        Returns:
        a article initialized with attributes from the database

      • getHandbook

        public java.util.List<ListItem> getHandbook()
        Retreives a whole handbook, containing both articles and categories. Only top-level items are returned. Other items are initilized and refered to from top-level categories or sub categories.
        Returns:
        a list containing top-level items.

      • insertCategory

        public long insertCategory(Category category)
        inserts a category to the database
        Parameters:
        category - the category to be inserted
        Returns:
        the row id of the newly inserted category

      • insertCategories

        public void insertCategories(java.util.List<Category> categories)
        Inserts a list of categories into the database
        Parameters:
        categories - list containing the categories to be inserted

      • getCategory

        public Category getCategory(java.lang.String id)
        Selects a category row from the datbase with the corresponding id
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the category to be retreived
        Returns:
        a category initialized with the attributes of the row
